body_html:
logs.txt
Sorry for reporting this issue, I feel this is not a bug but a problem related to my system memory.
I tried running with varied size parameter. it runs for size 256 and 512 but for 1024 there is a crash. I am giving 22M sentences, and vocab size of 1M. When I checked the logs for 1024, I saw that the crash is because of unavailability of memory. This is on a AWS instance with 4 GPU's of 4Gb each. I have attached the logs.

body:
[logs.txt](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/340736/logs.txt)
Sorry for reporting this issue, I feel this is not a bug but a problem related to my system memory.
I tried running with varied size parameter. it runs for size 256 and 512 but for 1024 there is a crash. I am giving 22M sentences, and vocab size of 1M.  When I checked the logs for 1024, I saw that the crash is because of unavailability of memory. This is on a AWS instance with 4 GPU's of 4Gb each. I have attached the logs.
